document.docAuthor: Mojica, José Ivan & Agudelo-Zamora, Henry D.
document.masterDocTitle: Historical review, catalog of type specimens and online database of the ichthyology collection of the Instituto de Ciencias Naturales of the Universidad Nacional de Colombia (ICN-MHN)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Historical review, catalog of type specimens and online database of the ichthyology collection of the Instituto de Ciencias Naturales of the Universidad Nacional de Colombia (ICN-MHN)

materialsCitation.collectorName: de Maracaibo & C. Casler & J. Toledo & W. Villalobos
materialsCitation.treatmentCitationGroup:
Cordylancistrus perijae
Pérez & Provenzano, 1996 : 29
, Fig. 2 . Paratype ( Fig. 38 ): ICN-MHN 17502 [ex MBUCV- V-21745] (1, 87.7 mm SL), Venezuela , Caño Colorado ,
100 m
from dam site, tributary of Palmar River ,
Lago de Maracaibo
basin, ca. 10°37’12”N 72°25’34’W; C. Casler , J. Toledo & W. Villalobos ,
11 Jul 1989
.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Chaetostoma brevilabiatum
Dahl, 1942 : 82
, figs. 1–2. Holotype ( Fig. 39 ): ICN-MHN 6134 ( 181.9 mm SL), Colombia , Antioquia , Remedios, Volcán River, near junction with San Bartolomé River, tributary of Magdalena River, 600 m asl.; G. Dahl, 1936–1939 .

subSubSection.paragraph:
Remarks : Ballen (2011) listed the holotype of
Chaetostoma brevilabiatum
in the appendix of the material examined, which had been assumed to be at MZLU . We suppose that Dahl requested and received a catalog number from MZLU but then he never sent the specimen. We found in the labels associated with the specimen the MZLU catalog number L36/3701, but at the MZLU database the holotype is under the catalog number L936/3701 (GBIF-Sweden 2016).

subSubSection.paragraph: Remarks : Ballen (2011) mistaken the last determiner of ICN-MHN 5593 (J. Arroyabe) with the real collectors (Galvis & Briceño).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Pseudancistrus atratoensis
Dahl, 1960a :455
, unnumbered figure. Holotype ( Fig. 45 ): ICN-MHN 51, female (82.0 mm SL), Colombia, Antioquia, Riosucio, Quebrada La Noche, upper Atrato River, western versant; G. Dahl, 10 Aug 1959 . Paratypes: ICN-MHN 46 (42, 42.0– 68.6 mm SL), ICN-MHN 74 (1, 61.1 mm SL), collected with the holotype.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Remarks : currently as
Dolichancistrus atratoensis ( Isbrücker, 1980 )
